/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with power lines and trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A white van is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
